title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: October 08, 2022, 02:50:50 PMLast edit: October 20, 2022, 12:21:47 AM by MoparMiningLLC
content: Just like the prior years Gold Bull and Gold Tiger, Balletcrypto brings the Gold Rabbit - only 1000 will be made.Ballet has agreed to set aside for me quite a few in order to guarantee that we can have enough for this group buy.QuoteThe Ballet REAL Bitcoin Gold Rabbit Limited Edition comes in newly-designed packaging and includes an elegant acrylic display case for collectors to proudly showcase this exceptional work of art. This REAL Series is not only the world’s easiest cryptocurrency wallet, but also the most beautiful.price is 99.00 - Shipping will be determined once they are received. If you want me to give to minerjones for consolidation, there will be no charge for the transfer from me to him.can pay via the following methods:Strike: strike.me/moparminingllcBTC: 1FGTHoXtr6X9PVm5qJpa9DbdZFpAGLAa8G or bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4espaypal: moparminingllc@gmail.com method removed - account is closed.DO NOT SEND PYMTS VIA CASHAPP OR VENMO - I CANNOT USE THOSE FUNDS AT THIS TIME.will close in 10 days. List:cygan - 1 paidtelegram buyer - 5 paid123Dave - 1Raritycheck - 2  paidtotal: 9

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Updated payment methods to remove paypal - after their most recent changes and giving themselves the right to fine someone based on what they buy or say on social media, I closed my account.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: 123Dave on October 10, 2022, 08:39:18 PMStill available Yes, as subject line states, open until the 18th

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I had ordered one before Ballet confirmed they would hold for the group buy The boxes are slightly bigger than the prior bull/tiger packages with seals that have to be peeled off the box to open. Wallet comes in the regular plastic case with the heavy acrylic one stored underneath so that you have both options for display.
